title: why
body: I just made a new account RIOT and i got lvl 5 to get my free chest and you guys send a message first? I exited the box that asks if i want the chest or not so now i don`t have a free chest. WTF

replies.body:
Try looking under the **LOOT** tab at the top of the client. You should see all the items in your Hextech Crafting Inventory there.

Let me know if you're still having trouble seeing it.
The new player chest should still be on your account, did you look in your Hextech inventory?
